name: Ihram
description: When you arrive in Mecca, enter the state of ihram by performing the intention and wearing the forbidden clothes.
details: Make the intention to perform Umrah.
Wear forbidden clothing: Ihram for men and modest clothing for women.

name: tawaf
description: Perform Tawaf, which includes circumambulating the Kaaba in seven rounds.
details: Start from the Black Stone and go in the counterclockwise direction.
Complete seven circuits around the Kaaba.
Reciting supplications and prayers during Tawaf.

name: quest
description: Perform the sa'y between Safa and Marwa seven times.
details: Start from Safa and move towards Marwa.
He walked quickly between Safa and Marwa, on a specific path.
Complete seven cycles of sa’i, and end at Al-Marwah.
Reciting supplications and prayers during the Sa'y.

name: shortening hair or shaving
description: Cut your hair short or shave it after sa'y.
details: Short your head hair by half an inch, or shave it completely.
This step is for men only, while women are satisfied with shortening their hair.

name: ascetic circumambulation
description: Perform the ritual circumambulation after cutting the hair or shaving.
details: Perform seven rounds of circumambulation around the Kaaba.
Reciting supplications and prayers during Tawaf.

name: ascetic quest
description: Perform the sa'y between Safa and Marwa seven times.
details: Perform seven rounds of sa’i between Safa and Marwa.
Reciting supplications and prayers during the Sa'y.

name: shortening hair or ascetic shaving
description: Cut your hair short or shave it after the ascetic quest.
details: Short your head hair by half an inch, or shave it completely.
This applies to both men and women.

name: Farewell Tawaf
description: Perform the farewell tawaf before leaving Mecca.
details: Perform seven rounds of circumambulation around the Kaaba.
Reciting supplications and prayers during Tawaf.
Courting and praying for farewell from a sincere heart.
